product_name: REI Rib-Knit Cable Infinity Scarf - Women's
long_description: Get your wardrobe ready for winter weather with the warm and attractive REI Rib-Knit Cable Infinity women's scarf. Features a soft blend of lambswool and nylon that's comfortable next to skin. REI Rib-Knit Cable Infinity scarf is one large loop that measures 52 in. in circumference by 10 in. wide.
short_description: Get your wardrobe ready for winter weather with the warm and attractive REI Rib-Knit Cable Infinity women's scarf.
